exercises.prompt: Don't waste time looking ___________ a cheap hotel when you arrive. They are all about the same price.
The man was questioned by the police after acting in a(n) ___________ way outside the bank.
Sharon never stops telling us how wonderful she is. She can be a little ___________.
If you ___________ all the lessons on the course, you get a certificate anyway.
Although they tried to put ___________ the fire for nearly two hours, eventually the firefighters had to give up.
It's absolutely ___________ tonight so make sure you wear both your gloves and your heavy coat.
Your behavior today will have serious ___________ for your future promotion chances.
How can you deny the allegations Mrs. Penney? ___________ people saw you leave the store without paying.
How can you possibly work in a zoo if you are terrified ___________ snakes?
Are you ___________ on foreign language films?
This government should be using far ___________ policies in an attempt to beat unemployment.
Homeschooling, which involves ___________ children at home, is becoming ever more popular.
Can you put me ___________ for two days if I come and stay with you?
The floods were caused by two days of ___________ rain.
It was only a minor accident and we all escaped without ___________.
By 10pm it was very dark and the black car was ___________ almost impossible to see.
Can I borrow $10 ___________ you until tomorrow? I have to buy a book for college.
There is so little time left until the exams. I think I need to just concentrate my effort ___________ the most important two exams that I cannot fail.
I was never very ___________ at history at school and now I work in a museum. How ironic!
My mother would like to consider herself ___________ but I think even she would be shocked if we took her to see that film!
When I first arrived in Russia, I took ___________ lessons from an old woman to help me with the language.
There was only a light ___________ in the morning with no sign that a storm was coming.
A new type of transistor radio has been ___________ by South African electrical engineers.
I want to play a game with you. First, ___________ about an animal you would like to be. Ready?
Seeing you in that red dress reminds me a lot ___________ our honeymoon. Do you remember that red dress you bought in Hawaii and you wore it nearly every day!
My favourite ___________ at school was undoubtedly geography. Now I want to study it at university.
You will need very different clothes when you go on holiday ___________ to where you go and the time of year.
This wine is from the north of the country, is drunk with the local fish and must be ___________ ice cold.
The price of heating oil has been ___________ up again by the local government. Many people have criticised them for doing so as winter approaches.
Houston is a very ___________ city in the summer and it can be very difficult to sleep at night.
My uncle is ___________ deaf so you may have to raise your voice a little, but don't shout at him!
After the government's defeat in parliament last night, the new transportation recommendations will have to ___________ a little longer before becoming law.
"Does this pen belong ___________ you Juan?" "No, it is Mick's I think."
I need to pass a difficult ___________ even before they see me for interview.
Pass me the ___________, I need to put these sheets together.
If you help me ___________ the potatoes, I will chop them and you can go and watch the movie.
It isn't going to rain tomorrow, they said, but there may be a few ___________ in the evening.
___________ sounding very boring, the film was actually pretty interesting. I would recommend it!
My doctor told me to follow a more ___________ diet and to cut down on my sugar and caffeine.
I went back to that house ___________ again but never saw anything that looked like a ghost ever again.
I am not accusing you ___________ taking the money. I just want to know if you know where it is!
Older people are going to make ___________ a larger proportion of the population in the future.
She saw me crying and I expected her to be ___________ to my problems but she just walked away.
You should make an omelette in a ___________ pan for the best results.
The equipment at the school is old-fashioned and in bad condition. ___________, the teachers seem very unmotivated.
The machine can be very dangerous, especially when it ___________ in motion.
You got back so late and you didn't even give me a proper ___________ why you hadn't called me! I'm very unhappy with you.
We have such a long car journey tomorrow. Make sure we bring enough food and games to ___________ for 4 hours so the kids don't get bored.
The champion dancer will hold a press ___________ tomorrow at which you will all be able to ask her any questions you may have.
When the water ___________, put the eggs in and leave them there for just over two minutes.
This rain means we can't go to the zoo today. ___________, I have a lot to do and it's best we stay home.
___________ you don't stay out too late, you may go to the party. But remember to be back here no later than 11.30pm.
Your attitude ___________ it absolutely impossible for me to sympathise with you, Jenny!
The government has a ___________ range of powers to deal with security threats, some of them introduced in recent years.
The problem with your daughter, Mrs. Reilly, is that she sits in my class paying ___________ or no attention to anything that is happening in the class.
Have you ___________ to the same conclusion as I have, Martin? That it must have been William in your office last night?
This house is so old now. When it rains, the windows leak and the roof needs to be replaced soon. ___________, we love it and would never move to another.
You can't ignore this problem any longer. You have to ___________ with it so we can go on with the plan.
I don't like watching soap operas and films on TV. I prefer documentaries with ___________ people talking about their lives.
Has someone moved the drinks ___________ the table while I was gone? I'm sure that glass in front of Peter was mine.
We couldn't find the hotel and it was getting dark ___________ we got out a map and studied it carefully.
Well, according to the timetable, a bus should be along in ___________ two minutes. But I wouldn't be surprised if we had to wait another half an hour!
Martin Jones, ___________ as the Gentle Bank Robber during his three-year reign, was jailed for 25 years today at the Central Court.
I was born about 30km ___________ Rome but have always lived in Great Britain.
Don't wash that sweater in hot water, ___________ it will shrink.
___________ the vacation, we had the most wonderful weather imaginable. Sunshine all the way!
Police arrested a man late last night in connection with the murder. Police expect to charge the ___________ later this morning.
Right, Mrs. Jones. Take these pills twice a day and if the problem ___________ more serious, come back and pay me a visit.
When each group of tourists have paid the entrance fee, ___________ them with a picnic hamper and two parasols.
You are the only person in this company who ___________ access to both the staff phone list and the bank information of every employee. Please remember it is a huge responsibility.
We all just looked at the bill and then realised that __________ wasn't even included! So we had to pay another 15% on top of that! I am never going back to that restaurant.
We got home to find the children __________ down the marble hallway in their socks.
It was in the 19th Century that scientists began to realise that monkeys and apes were ____________ relatives of man.
Overall, six universities have accepted my application but I ____________ to go to Chicago because my aunt and uncle live there.
The ____________ of the coastal areas in these parts were called "Myami" but the tribes died out around 600 years ago as European explorers moved into the area.
He's taken my bag! Just when you need a policeman, there isn't a single one in ____________!
Christmas Day ____________ on a Sunday this year.
My original ____________ was not to cut jobs but only to reduce expenditure in the company.
Why are you blaming your sister? In my opinion, you are ____________ to blame for this accident!
You should ____________ advantage of our special offer while we have it, Mrs. Foulkes.
Inspector Grant visited the suspect's house on three occasions and on the third ____________ a remarkable discovery.
By studying fossils, many things can be learnt including even the events that ____________ to the animal's death.
To ____________ up, what we would like to see is a more aggressive policing in the area and more attention given to the victims of crime...and less to the criminals!
My uncle has a large greenhouse in his garden which he uses to ____________ tropical fruit.
If we want to get to Chicago by sunset, it ____________ having to leave at dawn tomorrow.
It will be hard to find the area of land ____________ to build a factory such as this.
I like my part time job but I would like all the advantages of having a full-time contract, ____________ a company car and a good vacation package.
Be careful swimming Jason. The water here gets very ____________ suddenly.
Could you turn the central heating up a little more please. I can ____________ notice any difference in the temperature from an hour ago.
Scientists are warning that human activity is starting to cause ____________ in the Earth's climate due to increasing temperatures.
The unions are trying to present a ____________ front in their dispute with the government.
Though many eminent scientists have travelled to Loch Ness in Scotland, the famous monster has never been ____________ by any of them.
If you need to speak to me, I ____________ that my attorney is present.
We found a wonderful house just on the ____________ of the town.
Run to the supermarket! We're ____________ out of wine.
The islands in this area were ____________ when a huge volcano erupted.
I lifted the lid of the box just a centimetre or two and could ____________ two shiny eyes staring out at me.
The famous dodo, which lived on the island of Madagascar, ____________ extinct in the 17th Century.
A ____________ in communication led to further fighting.
I don't know why you are laughing Maggie. I consider this to be a ____________ serious issue.
Do you feel ____________ talking about your childhood?
The course also ____________ a few lesson specifically for those interested in going to live in Spain.
The noise in the hall was terrible but he just ____________ on speaking.
That's the first good idea you've ____________ since breakfast.
Michelle came nearer the house but then she ran ____________ when she saw our big black dog.
The tiger belongs to the big cat family, but ____________ the panther which lives in South America, it is found mainly in Asia.
Jason Rewerd, 27, has been charged with abandoning his ____________ and failing to report for duty.
The Antarctic may seem empty but it is actually ____________ to hundreds of animal species.
You can see how this artist has ____________ the well-known style of earlier artists.
____________ temperatures have made living in this region more difficult.
How much would it cost to put a new ____________ on this old picture?
In the event of fire, ____________ the glass and use the extinguisher.
I don't need these typewriters. If you can ________ a good use for them, you can have them.
I didn't buy this ring. It was ________ down to me by my uncle Peter.
The two soldiers looked up at the sun ________ in the sky.
I can't ________ why you lent him the money.
There's no way I can let you go out again tonight. ________, it's raining.
Only put a little oil. If you ________ in too much, it will be greasy.
The wild area to the north of the lake ________ of forests and small lakes.
We're going to play a game which should be ________ to you all: scrabble!
I couldn't ________ the courage to go inside the haunted house.
He is a very ________ man and you can learn a lot from him.
You can go anywhere along the riverfront ________ from 'The Grand Eatery'.
I got lost again. That ________ it three times this month!
They want to build a lake in the park, which ________ two districts.
Be careful of the high winds on that ________ stretch of road.
He now earns ________ to double what he earned before.
Each farmworker was given a small ________ of land.
Elvis Presley was, without ________, one of the best rock and roll singers of all time.
I stayed at work all day and ________ got very little done.
________ you won't appreciate it yet, you'll be happy that you stopped smoking when your health improves.
I haven't seen Kathy since we both ________ school in 1999.
For ________ of security, we have had to cancel tonight's performance...
...but all ticket costs will be refunded in ________.
He graduated from Harvard but never ________ to become as successful as his father was.
We had taken more supplies than usual with us ________ the weather turned bad.
That medicine is working well, I'm feeling better than _____.
Two thousand years ago, it was still _____ believed that the Earth was flat.
Can you _____ out the name of the mechanic you used?
I was walking _____ the street yesterday when I met my uncle.
I'm very _____ to the idea of working from home.
John Keely? Are you any _____ to Daniel Keely?
Can you find your _____ back to the main road?
I haven't been up into the attic for twenty years. Anything _____ be up there!
